data.name: Re.poly
data.detailed_description:
Important: The game is in development. Don't buy the game if you expect a full game or a lot of elements. The game will grow over time and if you
want to helping out in this process, you can communicate with the dev at any time.

What is this game about?

____________________________________________________

A dark age came upon the people of Aspira. The lord of the volcanic land broke the peace packt and implored
a dark war. He swore to wipe out humanity, which he saw as a danger to his peers. He conjured the demon
Kalis made all things man-made disappear. Even the human species seemed to be completely disappeared.
Only one, the sorcerer Grindun, could escape that. To get humanity back from the dark catches you have to
activate the restauration shrines he created and defeat the dark king to free Aspira.

____________________________________________________

What is possible?

____________________________________________________

Character customization

- There are some options for customize your character like gender, hair and hair color




Crafting

- Create tools for gathering resources
- Make equipment that protects you
- Make different workbenches to get new manufacturing capabilities


Economy and Agriculture

- Grow plants to survive.
- Buy animals from NPCs, breed them and sell their yields [In Progress]
- Cook recipes to serve you [In Progress]


{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/breeding.jpg


housing

- Build your own home with a lot of possibilities to serve your needs
- Decorate your home

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/buildhouses.jpg

Play with friends

- You can Host a game to play with 4 of your friends
- You can play online on the official server (50 players possible)


Raid other players or play together

- You have the possibility to raid other bases or play together


____________________________________________________

data.short_description: Build on what was once and defend it with your life. Survive the wild and defeat the evil, alone or with friends in a wonderful poly world.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 9600KF / Ryzen 5 1600x
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidea G-Force GTX 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7 6700k / AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidea G-Force GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
